title: ADIFF 2015 - Bilatena; Q&A
desc: (NY Premiere)?Abi, a dynamic and resourceful twelve year old boy, lives with his mother Degua and his 26 year old university graduate unemployed brother Zelalem (Zele). ?Abi, who is a hard working boy with two jobs, supports his poor mother and his older unemployed brother through their day to day lives. ?But when their mother dies of Hepatitus B and Abi is also infected by the virus, Zele must face the big challenge of supporting his own life and keeping his younger brother alive. Directed by Knife Banbu, 2014, Ethiopia, Drama, 105 min, Amharic w/?English subtitles. Q&A after screening
